alert.note: Alert for East Becker; East Polk; Mahnomen; North Clearwater; South Clearwater; West Becker (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 3:50PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Polk, Mahnomen, western Becker and southern Clearwater Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 350 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southwestern White Earth Nation, or 20 miles north of Detroit Lakes, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Northwestern Tulaby Lake around 400 PM CDT. Naytahwaush and Beaulieu around 405 PM CDT. Mahkonce around 410 PM CDT. Roy Lake around 415 PM CDT. Pine Bend, Island Lake in Mahnomen County and Rice Lake around 420 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northwestern Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: East Becker; East Polk; Mahnomen; North Clearwater; South Clearwater; West Becker
